javax.security.identitystore.query

Interface GroupRoleMap


  • public interface GroupRoleMap
    GroupRoleMap provides optional, additional group-role-mapping-related queries implemented by the identity store.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<String> getGroupRoles(String groupName)
      Determines a list of roles found in the identity store, which have been assigned to the given group.
      List<String> getGroupsWithRole(String role)
      Determines a list of groups found in the identity store, which have been assigned the given role.

    • Method Detail

      • getGroupsWithRole

        List<String> getGroupsWithRole(String role)
        Determines a list of groups found in the identity store, which have been assigned the given role.

        NOTE THAT depending on the identity store implementation, this method may only consider groups which are explicitly assigned a role. Groups assigned via evaluated expressions (e.g., XACML expressions) may not be considered.

        Parameters:
        role - The role name
        Returns:
        The list of groups which have been assigned the given role, empty list if none, null if not supported.

      • getGroupRoles

        List<String> getGroupRoles(String groupName)
        Determines a list of roles found in the identity store, which have been assigned to the given group.

        NOTE THAT depending on the identity store implementation, this method may only consider roles which are explicitly assigned to the group. Roles assigned via evaluated expressions (e.g., XACML expressions) may not be considered.

        Parameters:
        groupName - The group name
        Returns:
        The list roles assigned to the group, empty list if none, null if not supported.
